hero.title: Industrial Pipe Solutions
hero.description: Industrial pipes, fittings, and valves from certified global manufacturers.

about.label: About Broroma
about.title: Building Lasting Partnerships in Global Pipe Trade
about.description1: For over two decades, Broroma has been at the forefront of the industrial pipe trade industry. We specialize in connecting quality manufacturers with businesses worldwide, ensuring seamless transactions and reliable supply chains.
about.description2: Our deep industry expertise, combined with our commitment to quality and customer service, has made us the preferred partner for companies seeking dependable pipe sourcing and distribution solutions.

services.label: Our Services
services.title: Comprehensive Solutions for Your Business
services.description: From stock supply to installation, we provide comprehensive services covering sourcing, testing, fabrication, and maintenance for all your piping needs.

hero.label: About Broroma
hero.title: Building Trust Through Excellence
hero.description: Since 2002, we've supplied industrial pipes to projects across 50+ countries. No shortcuts. No surprises.

story.label: Our Story
story.title: From Local Supplier to Trusted Industry Partner
story.p1: Broroma began with a single, clear mission: to streamline industrial processes for our customers.
story.p2: What started as a small trading company has grown into one of Thailand's most trusted names in industrial pipe supply. Over the years, we've built our reputation on three principles — reliability, quality, and genuine partnership.
story.p3: Today, we serve customers across Power, Oil & Gas, Petrochemical, Sugar Mills, Boilers, and other process-driven industries. Our success isn't measured by products sold, but by the long-term relationships we've built and the problems we've helped solve.
story.p4: We're not just a supplier. We're the partner you call when it has to be right.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: Empowering Industries Through Reliable Supply
mission.description: Our mission is to be the most trusted partner in the global pipe trade industry, delivering unmatched quality, reliability, and value to our clients while fostering sustainable practices and long-term partnerships.

hero.title: Manual Valves
hero.description: Gate, globe, ball, check, and butterfly valves for flow control and isolation.

cta.title: Need Help Selecting the Right Valve?
cta.description: Our technical experts can help you select the optimal valve type, material, and pressure class for your specific application.

products.name: Globe Valves
products.description: Precision flow control valves with linear motion disc for throttling and regulating applications.

products.name: Gate Valves
products.description: Full-bore isolation valves for on/off service with minimal pressure drop when fully open.

products.name: Check Valves
products.description: Non-return valves preventing backflow in piping systems. Swing, lift, and wafer types available.

products.name: Ball Valves
products.description: Quarter-turn valves with spherical closure element for quick shut-off and tight sealing.

products.name: Butterfly Valves
products.description: Compact quarter-turn valves ideal for large diameter applications and flow regulation.

hero.title: Control Valves
hero.description: Automated control valves for precise flow, pressure, and temperature regulation in process systems.

cta.title: Need Help Selecting Control Valves?
cta.description: Our technical experts can help you select and size the optimal control valve for your process control requirements.

products.name: Globe Control Valves
products.description: Precision flow control valves with linear characteristics for accurate process regulation.

products.name: Gate Control Valves
products.description: Automated gate valves for on/off control and isolation in process systems.

products.name: Ball Control Valves
products.description: Quarter-turn control valves with characterized trim for modulating service.

products.name: Butterfly Control Valves
products.description: High-performance butterfly valves for large flow control applications.

hero.title: Flanges
hero.description: Pipe flanges for secure connections. Weld neck, slip-on, blind, socket weld, threaded, and lap joint.

cta.title: Need Help Selecting the Right Flange?
cta.description: Our technical experts can help you select the optimal flange type, material, and pressure class for your specific application.

products.name: Weld Neck
products.description: Tapered hub design for maximum strength at the weld joint. Best for high-pressure and high-temperature service.

products.name: Slip-On
products.description: Slides over the pipe for easy alignment and welding. Cost-effective choice for low-pressure applications.

products.name: Blind
products.description: Closes off the end of a piping system. Used for testing, inspection, or future expansion.

products.name: Socket Weld
products.description: Pipe inserts into the socket before welding. Ideal for small-diameter, high-pressure lines.

products.name: Threaded
products.description: Screws onto threaded pipe — no welding required. Best for low-pressure, non-critical systems.

products.name: Lap Joint
products.description: Two-piece design allows easy bolt alignment and rotation. Good for systems requiring frequent disassembly.

hero.title: Accessories & Instruments
hero.description: Actuators, steam traps, positioners, gauges, and instrumentation for process control and monitoring.

cta.title: Need Accessories for Your Project?
cta.description: Our team can help you source the right accessories and instruments for your piping system requirements.

products.name: Electric Actuator
products.description: Motor-driven actuators for automated valve control with precise positioning capability.

products.name: Pneumatic Actuator
products.description: Air-operated actuators for fast, reliable valve automation in process systems.

products.name: Steam Trap
products.description: Automatic condensate removal devices for efficient steam system operation.

products.name: Positioner
products.description: Valve positioners for accurate control valve positioning and feedback.

products.name: Level Gauge
products.description: Visual and electronic level indicators for tanks and vessels.

products.name: Transmitter
products.description: Pressure, temperature, and flow transmitters for process measurement.

products.name: Tube Fitting
products.description: Compression and flare fittings for instrumentation tubing connections.

products.name: Expansion Joint
products.description: Flexible connectors for thermal expansion and vibration absorption.

products.name: Pressure Gauge
products.description: Mechanical and digital pressure indicators for process monitoring.

products.name: Temperature Gauge
products.description: Bimetallic and filled system temperature indicators for local display.

products.name: Strainer
products.description: Y-strainers and basket strainers for pipeline debris removal.

products.name: Gaskets
products.description: Flange gaskets in spiral wound, ring joint, and sheet materials.

steel.name: Steel Pipes
steel.description: High-strength carbon steel pipes for structural, mechanical, and industrial applications. Available in various grades and specifications.

carbon.name: Carbon Pipes
carbon.description: Premium carbon steel pipes engineered for high-temperature and high-pressure applications in demanding environments.

stainless.name: Stainless Steel Pipes
stainless.description: Corrosion-resistant stainless steel pipes for food processing, pharmaceutical, and marine applications.

alloy.name: Alloy Pipes
alloy.description: Specialty alloy pipes including nickel alloys, duplex, and super duplex for extreme service conditions.

seamless.name: Seamless Pipes
seamless.description: Hot-rolled and cold-drawn seamless pipes offering superior strength and pressure resistance without weld joints.

welded.name: Welded Pipes
welded.description: ERW and SAW welded pipes for large-diameter applications, available in standard and custom lengths.

hero.title: Fittings
hero.description: Buttweld and forged fittings for complete piping systems.

buttweld.title: Buttweld Fittings
buttweld.description: Butt weld pipe fittings designed for permanent welded connections in high-pressure piping systems. Available in carbon steel, stainless steel, and alloy steel materials.

forged.title: Forged Fittings
forged.description: Socket weld and threaded forged fittings for small-bore, high-pressure piping applications. Manufactured from solid bar stock for superior strength.

buttweldElbow.name: Elbow (90° / 45°)
buttweldElbow.description: Buttweld elbows for changing pipe direction. Available in long radius and short radius configurations.

buttweldTee.name: Tee
buttweldTee.description: Buttweld tees for creating branch connections. Available in equal and reducing configurations.

buttweldReducer.name: Reducer
buttweldReducer.description: Buttweld reducers for transitioning between pipe sizes. Concentric and eccentric options available.

buttweldCap.name: Cap
buttweldCap.description: Buttweld caps for sealing pipe ends. Used for system termination and pressure testing.

buttweldStubEnd.name: Stub End
buttweldStubEnd.description: Stub ends for use with lap joint flanges. Economical option for stainless and alloy systems.

buttweldCross.name: Cross
buttweldCross.description: Buttweld crosses for four-way pipe connections. Available in equal and reducing configurations.

forgedCoupling.name: Coupling
forgedCoupling.description: Forged couplings for connecting two pipes. Available in full coupling and half coupling configurations.

forgedUnion.name: Union
forgedUnion.description: Forged unions for easy pipe disconnection. Three-piece design allows for maintenance access.

forgedElbow.name: Elbow
forgedElbow.description: Forged elbows for changing direction in small-bore piping. Available in 90° and 45° configurations.

forgedTee.name: Tee
forgedTee.description: Forged tees for branch connections in small-bore systems. Equal and reducing options available.

forgedCap.name: Cap
forgedCap.description: Forged caps for closing pipe ends. Socket weld and threaded connections available.

forgedBushing.name: Bushing
forgedBushing.description: Forged bushings for reducing pipe size. Hex head and flush designs available.

cta.title: Need Help Choosing the Right Fitting?
cta.description: Our technical experts are ready to help you select the optimal fitting for your specific application and requirements.

hero.title: Safety Valves
hero.description: Certified safety and relief valves for pressure protection.

products.name: Globe Safety Valves
products.description: Pressure relief valves with precise set pressure control for steam and gas applications.

products.name: Gate Safety Valves
products.description: High-capacity pressure relief valves for liquid service and large volume discharge.

products.name: Ball Safety Valves
products.description: Quick-opening safety valves with full-bore relief capacity for critical applications.

products.name: Butterfly Safety Valves
products.description: Large diameter pressure relief valves for low-pressure, high-volume applications.

cta.title: Need Help Selecting Safety Valves?
cta.description: Our technical experts can help you select and size the optimal safety valve for your pressure protection requirements.

powerGeneration.name: Power Generation
powerGeneration.description: High-pressure piping for thermal and nuclear power plants

cta.needQuoteBoilerTubes: Need a Quote for Boiler Tubes?
cta.needQuoteHeatExchanger: Need a Quote for Heat Exchanger Tubes?
cta.tellUsGrade: Tell us your grade, size, and quantity — we'll respond within 24 hours.
cta.tellUsOd: Tell us your grade, OD, and quantity — we'll respond within 24 hours.

detail.contactTeam: Contact our team for pricing, availability, and technical specifications.
detail.pressureRatingsValves: All safety valves are rated per API 520/526 and ASME Section VIII pressure-temperature tables. Set pressure, relieving capacity, and back pressure tolerance are certified per applicable codes. For specific sizing and certification data, contact our team or refer to the product catalog.
detail.pressureRatingsManualValves: All valves are rated per ASME B16.34 pressure-temperature tables. Pressure class ratings define the maximum allowable working pressure at specified temperatures per material group. For specific pressure-temperature data, contact our team or refer to the product catalog.
detail.pressureRatingsButtweld: All buttweld fittings are rated per ASME B16.9 pressure-temperature tables. Pressure ratings match the corresponding pipe schedule — e.g., a SCH 80 fitting matches the pressure rating of SCH 80 pipe of the same material and size. For specific pressure-temperature data, contact our team or refer to the product catalog.
detail.pressureRatingsForged: All forged fittings are rated per ASME B16.11 pressure-temperature tables. Pressure class ratings (3000#, 6000#, 9000# for socket weld; 2000#, 3000#, 6000# for threaded) determine maximum working pressure at temperature. For specific pressure-temperature data, contact our team or refer to the product catalog.
detail.pressureRatingsFlanges: All flanges are rated per ASME B16.5 pressure-temperature tables. Pressure class ratings define the maximum allowable working pressure at specified temperatures per material group. For specific pressure-temperature data, contact our team or refer to the product catalog.
detail.pressureRatingsTubes: All tubes are rated per applicable ASME/ASTM specifications. Working pressure depends on tube OD, wall thickness, material grade, and operating temperature. For specific pressure-temperature data, contact our team or refer to the product catalog.
detail.pressureRatingsAccessories: All accessories are rated per applicable industry standards. For specific pressure-temperature data, contact our team or refer to the product catalog.
detail.backToHeatExchangerTubes: Back to All Heat Exchanger Tubes

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: We supply industrial pipes, fittings, flanges, valves, boiler tubes, heat exchanger tubes, and accessories. All products are sourced from certified manufacturers and come with full documentation.
faq.q2: Do all products come with Mill Test Certificates?
faq.a2: Yes. Every product ships with original Mill Test Certificates (MTCs) documenting chemical composition, mechanical properties, and test results per industry standards.
faq.q3: What is the minimum order quantity?
faq.a3: MOQs vary by product. Standard items start at 5 metric tons. For smaller quantities or specialty items, contact us — we'll find a solution.
faq.q4: Which countries do you ship to?
faq.a4: We ship worldwide. Most orders go to Southeast Asia, Middle East, and Africa. Shipping time depends on destination — sea freight typically takes 2-5 weeks.
